text:
It would be nice if the <junit>-tasks showoutput-tag could be set
for stdout and stderr independently.

Background: our basic framework writes to stderr during initialization
until the true log-files are known and used. This output should not
interfere with the regular stdout-output during running tests. That
is for example used to show in-test progress.
creator: frieder.schenke@osp-dd.de
